alert.note: Alert for Grenada; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 8:26PM CDT until September 06 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Grenada County in north central Mississippi... Northwestern Webster County in north central Mississippi... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Coffeeville, or 9 miles northeast of Grenada, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Grenada and Gore Springs around 830 PM CDT. Misterton around 840 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
